EditorType.name: EditorType
EditorType.description: The editors which the plugin is available for ("word" - text document editor, "cell" - spreadsheet editor, "slide" - presentation editor).

InitDataType.name: InitDataType
InitDataType.description: The data type selected in the editor and sent to the plugin: "text" - the text data, "html" - HTML formatted code, "ole" - OLE object data, "desktop" - the desktop editor data, "destop-external" - the main page data of the desktop app (system messages), "none" - no data will be send to the plugin from the editor.

Variation.name: Variation
Variation.description: Plugin variations, or subplugins, that are created inside the origin plugin.

Button.name: Button
Button.description: The skinnable plugin button used in the plugin interface (used for visual plugins with their own window only, i.e. isVisual == true && isInsideMode == false).
